extendedIngredients.name: apple
extendedIngredients.original: 1 sweet apple, such as Fuji (about 8 oz.), rinsed, cored, and thinly sliced lengthwise
extendedIngredients.originalName: sweet apple, such as Fuji (about 8 oz.), rinsed, cored, and thinly sliced lengthwise
meta: such as fuji ( 8 oz.), rinsed, cored, and thinly sliced lengthwise

extendedIngredients.name: olive oil
extendedIngredients.original: 1 tablespoon grape-seed oil or mild olive oil
extendedIngredients.originalName: grape-seed oil or mild olive oil

extendedIngredients.name: orange blossom water
extendedIngredients.original: 2 tablespoons orange blossom or other mild honey
extendedIngredients.originalName: orange blossom or other mild honey

extendedIngredients.name: pecan
extendedIngredients.original: 1/3 cup pecan halves, toasted (see notes) and coarsely chopped
extendedIngredients.originalName: pecan halves, toasted (see notes) and coarsely chopped

extendedIngredients.name: red belgian endive
extendedIngredients.original: 2 heads red or white Belgian endive (about 11 oz. total), rinsed, ends trimmed, and cut lengthwise into 1/4-inch-wide slivers
extendedIngredients.originalName: red or white Belgian endive (about 11 oz. total), rinsed, ends trimmed, and cut lengthwise into 1/4-inch-wide slivers

extendedIngredients.name: white wine vinegar
extendedIngredients.original: 2 tablespoons champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar

title: Apple and Endive Salad with Honey Vinaigrette
summary: Apple and Endive Salad with Honey Vinaigrette might be just the side dish you are searching for. One serving contains 112 calories, 3g of protein, and 9g of fat. This recipe serves 6 and costs 75 cents per serving. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. A mixture of pecan halves, salt, mild olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. With a spoonacular score of 28%, this dish is not so tremendous. Similar recipes include Belgian Endive and Apple Salad With Cranberry Vinaigrette, Belgian Endive and Apple Salad with Cranberry Vinaigrette, and Belgian Endive, Fuyu Persimmon, and Baby Spinach Salad with Honey Mustard Vinaigrette.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix honey, vinegar, and oil. Add endive, apple, pecans, and blue cheese and mix gently to coat. Add salt to taste.

steps.step: In a large bowl, mix honey, vinegar, and oil.
Add endive, apple, pecans, and blue cheese and mix gently to coat.
